meanings.sent1: The ornithological club organized a bird-watching trip.
meanings.sent2: Her ornithological knowledge helped her identify the different bird species.
meanings.sent3: The ornithological expert could talk to birds in their own language.
meanings.sent4: His ornithological eyes spotted the rare bird hidden in the tree.
meanings.sent5: The ornithological field guide was filled with colorful illustrations.

meanings.sent1: She decided to pursue a career in ornithological research.
meanings.sent2: The ornithological conference attracted bird enthusiasts from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The ornithological professor had a pet parrot that helped with his studies.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an ornithological treasure trove of bird facts.
meanings.sent5: The ornithological lab was filled with chirping and tweeting sounds.
